data.title: El Triángulo de las Bermudas
data.meta_description: This book is the spanish translation of the english version "The Bermuda Triange: Pathway to Atlantis" which is about the Bermuda Triangle and the City of Atlantis.  The Bermuda Triangle is a mystery to people on Earth but the people of the City of Atlantis know exactly what cause the mysterious dis
data.text: Cary was raised in the Puget Sound area of Washington State. There she camped out in the Olympic Mountains and on Mount Rainier and developed a consciousness of the importance of wildlife and the wilderness at an early age. She developed a recognition of the world as a place of magic. After graduating from North Kitsap High School in Poulsbo, Washington, Cary moved to Oklahoma City, Oklahoma to reunite with family. There she received a Bachelors’ Degree from Oklahoma City University and passed the licensing for being a Certified Public Accountant. It was there that she started taking flying lessons. Marriage moved Cary to Key West, Florida. She became manager of the Navy Flying Club at the Naval Air Station in Key West. It was during this time that during a flight between Daytona Beach, Florida and Key West, Florida, Cary had a terrifying experience while flying through the Bermuda Triangle. In 2009, Cary completed a Master of Arts with a major in Earth Literacy from Saint Mary of the Woods College in Terre Haute, Indiana. Presently Cary is spending most of her time in Boquete, Panama. She just completed an edited edition of her book “The Bermuda Triangle : Pathway to Atlantis” which is being published by Author House Publishing. Her passion is recycling and saving the human species from extinction. Education: Bachelor of Arts degree – Oklahoma City University License – Certified Public Accountant Private Pilots License Master of Arts degree in Earth Literacy/Global Sustainabiltiy from St. Mary of the Woods College. Associations: AOPA Pilots Association American Mensa Society Treasure of Fundacion de Animales de Boquete Treasurer of Foundation of Amigos de Boquete
